name: GitHub: Real icons
description:
GitHub relies on a special icon font to display icons. I turn off font downloads (so that so-called “web designers” cannot force their typefaces on me), so in GitHub I see Hangul characters instead of icons.

This userstyle replaces font-based icons with real PNGs.
additional_info: I tried including the icons as data: URIs, but then the style is 200K and userstyles.org complains that’s way too big. So icons are on my GitHub account.
